tool_description: Synthesizes astrological chart elements into a comprehensive personality profile, integrating sign placements, aspects, and house emphasis into coherent psychological insights.

dominant_element.description: Most prominent element (Fire, Earth, Air, Water).

profile_focus.description: Profile emphasis: general, relationships, career, or spiritual.

challenge_areas.description: Areas of potential challenge or growth.

error_messages: Invalid zodiac sign: Use standard 12 zodiac sign names.
Invalid element: Use Fire, Earth, Air, or Water.
Invalid house numbers: Must be integers between 1 and 12.
Too many aspects: Maximum 20 major aspects can be processed.
usage: Provide core chart elements (sun/moon/rising signs, dominant patterns, aspects) and specify focus area to generate a comprehensive personality synthesis.

core_personality.description: Primary personality description integrating major factors

emotional_nature.description: Emotional patterns and inner world description

growth_areas.description: Areas for personal development and growth

life_approach.description: Overall approach to life and decision-making
